description:
Professional Text Editor + World's Best Hex Editor


- Fixed if 010 Editor is closed when minimized, the window was not sized correctly when restarting.
- Fixed using the <pos> attribute with strings did not always calculate the string size correctly.
- Fixed a possible crash passing a struct to SPrintf.
- Fixed SPrintf was not properly returning the number of characters written.
- Fixed Alt plus certain shortcut keys were not working properly in a floating tab group window.
- Fixed a possible crash reverting a file using the Repository dialog.
